attributes.action: Promise us you won't give the independent judge his conclusions and recommendations before he starts.
attributes.additional_details: Such is the depraved level of dishonesty rampant among politicians across the planet we know that ours are not above gross manipulation and misrepresentation of the truth and we DEMAND for once we have an honest and forthright inquiry which is not given its conclusions and recommendations BEFORE it even starts the inquiry into 'get out of jail free letters' being issued to terrorists.  We have so many recent examples of political interference, for party political gain, into so many of our political processes that we simply cannot believe politicians are even capable of acting honourably or honestly any more.
